metadata.title: keycloak: Unguarded admin REST API endpoints allows low privilege users to use administrative functionalities (important)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Keycloak. Certain endpoints in Keycloak's admin REST API allow low-privilege users to access administrative functionalities. This flaw allows users to perform actions reserved for administrators, potentially leading to data breaches or system compromise. 
            STATEMENT: Red Hat has evaluated this vulnerability. This affects only Keycloak server and no Keycloak clients library ship the affected code.
            MITIGATION: Mitigation for this issue is either not available or the currently available options don't meet the Red Hat Product Security criteria comprising ease of use and deployment, applicability to widespread installation base or stability.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
org.keycloak-keycloak-parent is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
